text: as First Minister of Scotland I pledge
that I will ensure that Scotland does
everything possible to help this refugee
crisis I will be far from the only
person reduced to tears last night at
the picture of a little boy washed up on
a beach that wee boy has touched our
hearts but his is not an isolated
tragedy he and thousands like him whose
lives are at risk is not somebody else's
responsibility they are the
responsibility of all of us so yes I am
angry very angry at the walk horn by on
the other side approach of the UK
government
I implore David Cameron to change his
position and change it today and I
pledge as first minister of this country
that we stand ready to help offer
sanctuary to refugees who need our help
